version_description:
Current Update - v1.02: 
* We fixed several potential crash bugs, increase the stability.
* For Registered user who still display nickname as a guestï¼Œ the nickname would become correct after entering a PVP game.

In the V1.12 update, we added:
-New Armor set and weapon
-Adjusted PVP weapon balance
-Add more Buff hint on HUD

Thanks for your support. Should you have any ideas, please send an email to ios@freyr.com

v1.13 Update
-New weapon and armor; New shield buff
-New vehicle appear in part of the PVP map
-Able to remove certain player in co-op preparation stage
-New "friend" tag in room list
-Account password change is available
-Tune PvP balance
-Fix iOS8.2 font issue
-Add joystick reverse option

Thanks for your support. Should you have any ideas, please send an email to ios@freyr.com.

V1.20 Update: 
-New weapon SRM-331 Kaneria
-New weapon A22CA EarthBreaker
-New armor Doomsday Knight
-New backpack Specter
-New Achievement system
-15 New PvP perk
-Bug fixes and optimize

Thanks for your support. Should you have any ideas, please send an email to ios@freyr.com.
